Camil VERCANDE 1.Camil married Ines PIERCE.

Ines PIERCE 1.Ines married Camil VERCANDE.

They had the following children:

F i Anna Camile VERCANDE was born on Apr 8 1912. She died on Jan 20 2004. M ii Lawrence "Pat" VERCANDE was born on Mar 24 1922. He died on Oct 2 2008. M iii Joseph "JC" Cloyd VERCANDE "JC" 1 died on Jan 5 2004.

Joseph Cloyd (J.C.) Vercande, 95, died following a brief illness on Mon., Jan. 5, 2004, at the English Valley Care Center in North English.

He was born Jan. 26, 1908, near Williamsburg, the son of Camil and Ines Pierce Vercande. He attended Pilot Grove Country School near Williamsburg. He was united in marriage to Martha Anna Schwarting in Williamsburg on Sept. 7, 1927. They farmed near Williamsburg until 1940, when they moved to their farm near North English. He was a member of St. Joseph Catholic Church, a Farm Bureau member since 1931 and had served on the Supply County Board in Williamsburg for 12 years. He also did road work for English Township for several years. He retired from farming in 1995. He became a resident of the English Valley Care Center in North English in August 1998.

He is survived five sons, Leo, Eldon, Dale, Benny, all of North English and Robert of Hills; 22 grandchildren; 37 great-grandchildren; two great-great-grandchildren; two brothers, Vernon of Ladora, and Lawrence of Brooklyn; four sisters, Mae Zuber of Williamsburg; Anna Kruse and Jean Smith both of Tucson, Ariz. and Lanore Benest of Cedar Rapids.

He was preceded in death by his parents; his wife; a daughter, Maryann Fuller, in infancy; a granddaughter; two infant great-granddaughters; and sister, Irene Vercande.

Funeral services will be held at 10 a.m. Thurs., Jan. 8, at St. Joseph Catholic Church in North English with the Rev.

David Hitch officiating. Burial will be in the St. Patrick Little Creek Cemetery near Kinross. Visitation will be from 4 to 8 p.m. on Wed., Jan. 7 (today), at the Powell Funeral Home and Cremation Service in North English. A wake service will be held at 6:30 p.m. Wednesday (today) at the funeral home. Visitation will continue from 9 a.m. until service time Thursday at the church.

A general memorial fund has been established. M iv Vernon VERCANDE 1. Vernon resided 2 in Oct 2008 in Marengo, Iowa Co, Iowa. F v Mae VERCANDE. F vi Lenore VERCANDE. F vii Jean VERCANDE. F viii Irene VERCANDE 1.

Irene died in early childhood.
